jobDescription: THIS IS NOT A REMOTE OPPORTUNITY/ NO THIRD-PARTY VENDORSWho is Taos? Taos is an IT consulting and services company that offers expertise across the strategic, management and tactical layers of IT and engineering organizations. Taos is immediately hiring a Data Scientist for a cutting-edge tech company in San Francisco, CA! Who you are: You are an experienced Data Scientist with a passion for advanced data analysis. You appreciate a stable but fun start-up like environment. You are a hard worker and more importantly, a contributor to the continuously changing business and technological environments around you. You are detail-oriented, thrive on creating structure from chaos, and you have excellent written and verbal communication. You have the knowledge and experience necessary to act as the go-to person on your team for all things data analysis and data science.
